pkgmetadata.longdescription: Novel Methods for Reproduction Number Estimation, Back- Calculation, and Forecasting // A collection of functions related to novel methods for estimating R(t), created by the lab of Professor Laura White. Currently implemented methods include two-step Bayesian back-calculation and now-casting for line-list data with missing reporting delays, adapted in 'STAN' from Li (2021) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1009210, and calculation of time-varying reproduction number assuming a flux between various adjacent states, adapted into 'STAN' from Zhou (2021) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1010434.
